5 XGBoost classification

Source: vignettes/articles/5-XGBoost-classification.Rmd
5-XGBoost-classification.Rmd
library(rfintext)
library(rfinstats)
library(dplyr)
library(xgboost)
library(caret)
library(topicmodels)
library(quanteda)
library(doFuture)
plan(multisession)
aspol_y <- aspol |>
  preprocess_corpus() |>
  left_join(taantuvat)
#> Dropped 216172 rows
#> Dropped 2263 rows
#> Dropped 18 rows
#> Dropped 31789 rows
#> Dropped 21951 rows
#> Dropped 4834 rows
#> Joining with `by = join_by(kunta)`
dtm <- aspol_y |> corpus_to_dtm(kunta, LEMMA)
split_data_test <- function(data, variable) {
  y = dplyr::pull(data, {{variable}})
  trainIndex <- caret::createDataPartition(y, p = .8, 
                                           list = FALSE, times = 1)
  
  dataTrain <- data[trainIndex, ]
  dataTest <- data[-trainIndex, ]
  
  list("Train" = dataTrain, "Test" = dataTest)
}
aspol_data <- split_data_test(aspol_y, luokka)
dtm

k_values <- c(2, 6, 9, 16)
lda_dtm <- foreach(k = k_values) %dofuture% {
  rfintext::get_doc_topic_prob(dtm, k = k) |>
    tidytext::cast_dfm(document, topic, gamma)
}
#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated

#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated

#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated

#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated
names(lda_dtm) <- paste0("k_", k_values)
